metadata.title: CVE-2019-14296 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: canUnpack in p_vmlinx.cpp in UPX 3.95 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (SEGV or buffer overflow, and application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted UPX packed file.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
